name: Dicey Golf (Joabutt)
description:
NOTE: PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Made for Gmtk Game Jam 2022. Instructions:

At the start of the game, you will roll a dice. You are given exactly 2 minutes to complete all the golf levels. The number you roll on the dice will multiply how fast the time will go. If you complete the levels within the time frame, you win! If you don't, you lose. (duh)

Controls: 

Drag to shoot, Scroll to zoom.

Anyways, thanks for playing my game! Enjoy!
